title: Implementation Proposal: User analytics
body:
# Summary
I, platocrat, propose to work for the Rari Capital DAO to implement user analytics for Rari's Fuse pools for payment of 2500 USDC and $2500 worth of RGT.
Implementation deadline is July 1st, with a 4-day grace period.

# Background
I'm a dropout from the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign.
I majored in psychology but took a bunch of courses that interested me, including:

- 2 graduate-level statistics-for-psych courses,
- 2 graduate-level risk management courses (risk mgmt. for financial institutions, and commodity and currency risk management),
- applied cryptography,
- computer science for statistics,
- options & commodities,
- options (finance) course,
- international macro & forecasting,
- basic statistics

With my psych and analytical background demonstrated above, I can bring a strong analytical mind to this task in terms of analysis of assets and risk-focused metric design around user behavior.

I can also code in JavaScript, TypeScript, and Solidity, but tbh, I'm no wizard-like Ben or Jet 😅 .

Recently, I've been interning at OptimismPBC since March 16th with the initial role of leading developer experience and community engagement. Although, I ended up trying to help wherever I could. This led me from expanding Optimism's documentation to being the primary point-of-contact for hackers during the Scaling Ethereum hackathon, where I directly helped debug issues with hackers' projects and helped to raise and triage new issues with our stack on GitHub. From the experience I gained from the hackathon, I occasionally helped ChainLink and Synthetix with issues in their integration tests. I also generally helped with smaller GitHub issues and have been the primary Discord support person since I joined Optimism 🙂.

Twitter: https://twitter.com/platocrat
GitHub: https://github.com/platocrat

# Spec of work
I propose to work for the DAO to help with the following work:

Create and use advanced metrics to build visualizations (in grafana or a d3 library) of user behaviour such as mean/median loan duration in various pools/assets, mean/median profit or loss for users in various pools/assets, graphs for correlation between market leverage / rates and market prices of assets, average wealth of user - fish or whale, other protocols used by most common Fuse users, and so on, return rates for users who make losses or encounter “bad” Fuse pool behaviour. More/different/custom metrics will be used (tbd.) that are tailored to better understanding users of Fuse pools.

Metrics not pre-defined here will be listed in an additional section at the bottom of this proposal.

I will consult with @t11s to learn the proper calls to the fuse pool contracts.
I will also consult with the team on ways to improve Fuse in light of this data.
I am also willing to provide continuous support/development for the visualizations I create.

# Timeline
From whenever this proposal is accepted until July 1st, with a 4-day delay, at most.

# Payment
2500 USDC and $2500 worth of RGT
author: 0x82a05859F79368b03e92d7588603E431fa24E4Ef
